field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the header_check rule.

field.label: Expression
field.help:
Set a regexp (POSIX regular expression) and an action to process like 
/^\s*User-Agent/ IGNORE
Note: The regexp is not validated by this form. Please test it carefully.

field.label: Process filter
field.help:
Set when the header_check should be processed.
See the Postfix manual about header_checks(5)
